item.description:
Join SPOT for a fun and informative tennis clinic where you will learn tactics to maximize your strengths and to exploit your opponents weaknesses.  This 90 minute clinic is for strong intermediate to advanced players (3.5 - 4.0).  Instructors spread across 3 or more courts as players drill and enjoy a games based approach to improving their tennis.

This 8 week Clinic runs weekly on Sundays 9 - 10:30 am from

May 5 - June 23  $120

June 30 - Aug 18 $120

Aug 25 - Oct 13   $120

If you cannot come to all 8 classes but still want to come, players are welcome to drop in at a per clinic cost of $20.
item.how_to_find_us: next to the zoo in Roger Williams Park, Providence www.SPOTRI.com
item.name: Advanced Clinic
